Recipe.title: Barley Stoup
Recipe.Source: From the Kitchen of Orrilla VanOrman
Recipe.Description: When Ransom was growing up, his mother used to make a simple dish that was chunky like a stew, but brothy like a soup, so, we decided to call it "stoup".

section.instruction: Cut all vegetables into spoon-sized chunks.
In a large saucepan, brown the Hamburger.
Add Water, Potatoes, Carrots, Onions, Pearl Barley, Salt and Pepper.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until Potatoes and Carrots are tender.
Remove from heat then add Frozen Petite Peas.

Modifications.modification: If you like a little more flavor, add 4 beef bouillon cubes with the Water.
